services.title: Multi-Carrier Tariff & Labeling Platform
services.subtitle: Streamline your shipping operations with our comprehensive platform
services.description: MMCore is a cloud-based, fully scalable solution that allows companies to manage, optimize, and automate their shipping processes across 35+ carriers delivering to 50+ countries from one centralized system.

apiDocs.title: MMCore API Documentation
apiDocs.subtitle: Complete reference for integrating with our multi-carrier shipping platform
apiDocs.introText: The MMCore API provides comprehensive access to our multi-carrier shipping platform. Integrate with 35+ carriers worldwide through a single, unified API.
apiDocs.authDescription: All API requests require authentication using your API key in the header.
apiDocs.getTrackingDesc: Retrieve detailed tracking information for shipments
apiDocs.postLabelDesc: Generate shipping labels for various carriers
apiDocs.postManifestDesc: Submit manifest data for shipment processing
apiDocs.postLockShipmentDesc: Lock manifest data to prevent further modifications
apiDocs.postShipmentRequestDesc: Create new shipment requests with carrier selection
